May 17, 2003 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Flugel (Abergavenny) Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed
